original_text: The word of the Lord came to Jeremiah while he was shut up in the court of the guard:
korean_text: 예레미야가 감옥 뜰에 갇혔을 때에 여호와의 말씀이 그에게 임하니라 이르시되

sentences.original_text: The word of the Lord came to Jeremiah
while he was shut up in the court of the guard:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 시위대 뜰에 갇혀 있을 때에
